User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/534.50 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Safari/534.50

Steps to reproduce:

I have Thunderbird version 5.0 set to start a login, with the hide box ticked


Actual results:

The Mac starts and thunderbird always opens a window and remains on the desktop


Expected results:

The Mac starts, thunderbird remains hidden, but checks the mail in the background

This was working in version 3.1
